text: @AndrewYang @AndrewYang you sold your base out for a racist old establishment white dude. Someone who contributed to the bureaucracy that slowed the process of this #coronavirus pandemic.He also supported the 1994 crime bill that created a pipeline to prison,and is now endorsed by Bloomberg
